item.title: Review: Framework Desktop is a mash-up of a regular desktop PC and the Mac Studio
item.description: Size matters most for Framework’s first stab at a desktop workstation/gaming PC.

item.title: Nvidia warns of “disaster” if it has to put kill switch and backdoor in chips
item.description: Nvidia denies China accusation of kill switch but worries US will require one.

item.title: Trump caving on Nvidia H20 export curbs may disrupt his bigger trade war

item.title: Nvidia chips become the first GPUs to fall to Rowhammer bit-flip attacks
item.description: GPUhammer is the first to flip bits in onboard GPU memory. It likely won’t be the last.
